The six-pupiled eye symbol on the cover watches you like a patient predator.\n\nThe elderly librarian remains standing now, watching you with an expression caught between curiosity and concern. His earlier cryptic warning hangs in the air: \"The most dangerous books often contain the most valuable knowledge.\"\n\nThe book seems to pulse with dormant power, waiting for someone brave—or foolish—enough to unlock its secrets.",
